name: TITONIC FISHERMAN
description:
TITONIC FISHERMAN: A VERY NORMAL MUSIC SEQUENCER

C O N T R O L S:
Press these keys to make sounds: 

Q W E R T Y U I O P A S D F G H
To clear the pattern: Z
To switch modes: X

TITONIC FISHERMAN was commissioned by Now Play This

(If the game is running slowly or without sound, try using Firefox, or download it for Windows below)
